name: Escape The Ceremony
description:
There's something creepy and weird about this game, but I assure you this doesn't contain any sudden scare... Maybe turn down the sound a little bit? >-<

I designed and made this game with Unity. The art is original by my friend Liz. Feel free to follow her instagram @lizzzzzzzzz_sun.

Feel free to contact me by sending me emails at bethsunj37@163.com.

Mechanics:

Use WASD to move, use SPACE to jump.

Sounds:

Downloaded from freesound.org.

Background Music:

Fishermen' Song of the Evening (Guqin Instrumental)

Inspirations:

The Carnival of Deformity (PLAYTHROUGH DEMO)

3D Animation - Paper Style Promo Show
